text: Zoltan Sztehlo (27 November 1921 – 16 June 1990) was a Hungarian-Canadian equestrian. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Canadian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Zoltan Sztehlo
